creator: neil.laurance@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 26982
Patch of trunk - affects listeners.xml only

Related to 51119

Update to listeners.xml documentation to describe file-based and JAAS based authentication and authorisation with JMXRemoteLifecyleListener.

Also general tidy up of this page.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: Thanks for the patch. It has been applied to 7.0.x and will be included in 7.0.15 onwards.
